text: pas jin logon ne eemaan kubool kiya hai aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam kie hain unaka unhen savaab poora poora bhar dega balki apane fazal (va karam) se kuchh aur jyaada hee dega aur log usaka banda hone se inkaar karate the aur shekhee karate the unhen to dardanaak azaab mein mubtila karega aur lutf ye hai ki vah log khuda ke siva na apana saraparast hee paenge aur na madadagaar
